name: It All Comes Crashing Down
description:
Do You Stack Up?

Your objective is to stack blocks for six minutes and achieve the maximum possible height, while being beset by dastardly sabotages every 10 seconds!

That sound? Oh, that's just the house settling...

Controls (Keyboard):

Move block left and right:  Arrow Keys | A/D

Rotate Block: Z/X | Numpad 4/6 | Mouse Buttons

Start Game: Spacebar

Controls (Gamepad):

Move block left and right: D Pad | Left Analogue Stick

Rotate Block: L/R Bumpers | East and West Face Buttons

Start Game: Start | South Face Button

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51. The theme was Every 10 Seconds.
